name: Cardinal Capital Partners
overview: Cardinal Capital Partners is an investment firm that focuses exclusively on the acquisition of corporate real estate. They help clients achieve their financial goals by converting their real estate assets into capital. Cardinal Capital approaches each transaction as an opportunity to exceed expectations. Simply put, they are one of the largest sale-leaseback principals in the country. Since their founding in 1988, they have acquired hundreds of corporate real estate properties valued in excess of $4 billion. But the real measure of the success is the results they achieve for the clients. By specializing in net leased real estate, they have developed the expertise to create financing solutions that maximize the value of the clientsâ€™ real estate assets.

funding_round.source_description: Zoove Raises $13 Million in Third Round of Financing
